earnStaking.title: EARN BY STAKING
earnStaking.description: Earn rewards for contributing to liquidity and safety.

ixtStakingInfo.title: Stake IXT
ixtStakingInfo.description: Stake your IXT holdings to earn more IXT. The longer you stake, the more you yield. Lock up your tokens and maximize earnings by stabilizing the liquidity. Accumulate more IXT, so you can increase your governance in the future Planet IX DAO.

lpStakingInfo.title: Stake LP
lpStakingInfo.description: Provide liquidity for the ecosystem and stake your LP tokens to earn more IXT. By providing liquidity, you secure the network, demonstrate ownership of the game, and ensure stable exchanges. Engagement is rewarded with regular payouts to all stakers.

ixtStaking.title: IXT STAKING
ixtStaking.description: Earn rewards for contributing to liquidity and safety.

lpStaking.title: LP STAKING
lpStaking.description: Earn rewards for contributing to liquidity and safety.

usdtIxtStaking.title: USDT/IXT LP Staking
usdtIxtStaking.description: Provide liquidity on DEX and Stake LP

territoryStaking.title: YOUR TERRITORIES
territoryStaking.description: Explore your territory NFTs and their total payout amounts

energyStaking.title: ENERGY STAKING
energyStaking.description: Stake Energy Tokens to recieve IXT or Gravity Grade Packs with PIX Contents. You can also stake Energy in the sustainability pool to donate a percentage of your yield to the Amelia Foundation.

landmarkStaking.title: LANDMARKS
landmarkStaking.description: Explore your landmarks and discover the commission amounts paid out to your account.

metashareStaking.title: METASHARE STAKING
metashareStaking.description: Each corporation’s treasury acts as a staking pool for MetaShares and the reward is $IXT.

territoryBox.title: TERRITORY NFT STAKING
territoryBox.description: Stake your Area, Sector, Zone and Domain NFTs to earn IXT staking rewards from the pool

energyBox.title: ENERGY STAKING
energyBox.description: Energy staked is burned upon staking.

landmarkBox.title: LANDMARK NFT STAKING
landmarkBox.description: Stake your Landmark NFTs to earn IXT marketplace fees.

metashareBox.title: METASHARE STAKING
metashareBox.description: Each corporation’s treasury acts as a staking pool for MetaShares and the reward is $IXT.

governance.title: GOVERNANCE
governance.description: Track proposal statuses and vote on changes.

staking.title: METASHARE STAKING
staking.description: Each corporation’s treasury acts as a staking pool for MetaShares and the reward is $IXT.

corporation.title: CORPORATIONS METASHARE
corporation.description: MetaShares grant you the authority to influence the corporation's future and to earn a monthly portion of the corporation's profits.

corpPerformance.title: CORPORATIONS' PERFORMANCE
corpPerformance.description: Rewards earned from staking MetaShares in the last 24 hours and 30 days.

territoryStaking.title: TERRITORY STAKING
territoryStaking.description: Explore your territory NFTs and their total payout amounts

yourTerritories.title: YOUR TERRITORIES
yourTerritories.description: Search and select from the territories you own.

area.title: AREA
area.description: Collect PIX and form Clusters. Group your Clusters into Areas. Areas start with groups of 10 PIX in the Outliers, 20 in Common, 30 in Uncommon, 40 in Rare and 50 in Legendary Territories. This you can accomplish by trading PIX on planetix.com. Stake your Area to earn IXT staking rewards.

sector.title: SECTOR
sector.description: Collect PIX and form Clusters. Group your Clusters into Sectors. Sectors start with groups of 50 PIX in the Outliers, 100 in Common, 150 in Uncommon, 200 in Rare and 250 in Legendary Territories. This you can accomplish by trading PIX on planetix.com. Stake your Sector to earn IXT staking rewards.

zone.title: ZONE
zone.description: Collect PIX and form Clusters. Group your Clusters into Zones. Zones start with groups of 100 PIX in the Outliers, 200 in Common, 300 in Uncommon, 400 in Rare and 500 in Legendary Territories. This you can accomplish by trading PIX on planetix.com. Stake your Zone to earn IXT staking rewards.

domain.title: DOMAIN
domain.description: Collect PIX and form Clusters. Group your Clusters into Domains. Domains start with groups of 200 PIX in the Outliers, 400 in Common, 600 in Uncommon, 800 in Rare and 1000 in Legendary Territories. This you can accomplish by trading PIX on planetix.com. Stake your Domain to earn IXT staking rewards.

catRaff.title: IXT CAT RAFF
catRaff.description: Earn more with the IXT Cat Raff! Each week a randomized raffle selects five players to share 2,500 IXT rewards in winnings. In order to participate, players stake IXT in exchange for raffle tickets. To roll over from one week to the next, add your tickets from the previous week. A one-week lock period applies, where players can only withdraw their tokens once the next draw is completed.

prizePortfolio.title: Prize Portfolio
prizePortfolio.subtitle: Track balances
prizePortfolio.description: Prize Portfolio shows the balance tracking related to the IXT CAT RAFF. This might include the total deposits, weekly odds, weekly prize, and the next draw timing.

stakingContract.title: New IXT CAT RAFF Staking Contract
stakingContract.description: Stake your IXT to our new, updated and improved Cat Raff staking contract. The new Cat Raff fetches randomized winners from the Chainlink VRF algorithm, which ensures verifiable randomness. By implementing Chainlink VRF’s verifiable randomness, IXT Cat Raff users will be able to verify that each winner is selected with an unbiased source of randomness. In addition to being more secure, it also ensures our architecture is operating in a provably secure and verifiably random manner, free of manipulation or interference. To participate in the raffles, players stake their IXT to our new Cat Raff staking Contract and receive Tickets in exchange. Each week, five winning tickets will be selected to share 2,500 IXT rewards in winnings.In order to participate, players have to stake IXT in exchange for raffle tickets. To roll over from one week to the next, add your tickets from the previous week. A one-week lock period applies, where players can only withdraw their tokens once the next draw is completed.

stakeToReceiveTickets.title: Stake your IXT to receive Tickets

addPreviousWeekTickets.title: Add tickets from previous week
addPreviousWeekTickets.description: Roll-over your Tickets from week to week to be included in the next raffle

withdrawIXT.title: Withdraw your IXT
withdrawIXT.description: If you withdraw your IXT you will no longer be participating in the Cat Raffles

pastWinnings.title: PAST WEEK WINNINGS
pastWinnings.description: Details of past winning tickets can be seen below. The randomness of these tickets is verifiable on chain. To increase your odds of winning, stake more IXT above and roll your tickets over consistently week by week.

myLandmarks.title: MY LANDMARKS
myLandmarks.description: Search and select from the landmarks you own

explore.title: EXPLORE LANDMARKS
explore.description: Search and select from the landmarks

staking.title: ENERGY STAKING
staking.description: Stake Energy Tokens to recieve IXT or Gravity Grade Packs with PIX Contents. You can also stake Energy in the sustainability pool to donate a percentage of your yield to the Amelia Foundation.

pool.title: CHOOSE YOUR POOL
pool.description: Stake Energy and IXT in 30 days epochs to claim rewards

earn.title: Earn IXT
earn.description: Stake your Energy together with IXT in a 1-1 ratio to earn IXT rewards from the Play 2 Earn pool. Every epoch is 30 days and when the 30 days is over your energy will be burned. The IXT stays locked until you claim it.

earnGive.title: Earn and Give
earnGive.description: Stake Energy in the Sustainability Pool and give part of your earnings to the Amelia Foundation. You decide on the specific percentage given from your IXT Rewards.

forItx.title: ENERGY FOR IXT
forItx.description: Stake your Energy together with IXT at a 1-to-1 ratio and earn rewards from the Play-to-Earn pool

ameliaFoundation.title: AMELIA FOUNDATION
ameliaFoundation.description: Stake your Energy together with IXT at a 1-to-1 ratio and earn a bit less rewards, and contribute to saving the planet earth

ameliaFoundationBox.title: Earn IXT for contributing to charity, liquidity and safety.
ameliaFoundationBox.description: Energy staked is burned upon staking.

assetPool.title: ASSET POOL
assetPool.description: Let your holdings shine with the Midas Touch. From an individual DeFi user to a Dao or Treasury, users can take advantage of Midas to earn yield, borrow against, or lend their favorite tokens.
